author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Social Responsibility
Facebook is feeling the heat after the U.S. indictment of 13 Russian citizens and three Russian companies for an alleged campaign to interfere in the 2016 election. One of those companies orchestrated what amounted to a propaganda startup that allegedly used social-media technologies to sow discord, according to U.S. authorities. The indictment, secured by special counsel Robert Mueller, details how alleged efforts to spread “distrust towards the candidates and the political system in general”...
